dialogues.text:
Analyzing environment...
This surface doesn't match the previous ones.
It doesn’t seem easily penetrable.

I see. Any ideas that don’t involve me
crashing into it?

Are you not familiar with the abilities integrated
into your suit?

Of course I know them. What I don’t know are the
rare materials on these planets.
That’s where you come in, remember?

And to think that, even with blank memory, you
haven’t lost that impatience of yours.
Maybe it's just a matter of time...

You’ve currently used two of the three
available abilities.

So... would the shield block be useful to break
through it?

Not to break through it. To break it.
The force generated will be released after the impact
and propel you as the sphere would.

I can't confirm that throwing yourself into the void is
your intention, but if you do, check what’s below
you before breaking anything.
